Get Started

Card Payment Service

Card acceptance that fits your business

From online checkout to secure card-on-file using card that fit your business and needs.

Cross-Product Benefits

The following are the benefits of using card payment service:

One Contract, One API, One Dashboard

Reduce complexity for your teams with a unified integration and management layer.

Approvals and Roles Everywhere

Consistent access control and approval workflows across all products.

Webhooks & Idempotency

Built-in resilience with clean retries, event notifications, and guaranteed consistency.

Compliance by Design

PSP-licensed infrastructure built around regulatory and operational compliance.

Finance-Ready Reporting

Settlement summaries, exports, and audit logs that drastically reduce finance workload.

Faster Settlements, Fewer Failures

Built-in retries, clear error codes, and optimized routing reduce delays and failures.

What you get

Here is what you get when using our Card Payments Service.

Hosted Card Checkout

Fast, secure, and brandable checkout with support for 3-D Secure where applicable.

Tokenization

Save secure tokens for repeat payments, subscriptions, or one-click renewals.

Risk Tools

Velocity checks and rule-based decisions to reduce fraud and payment failures.

Unified View

Cards sit alongside mobile money and bank accounts: one ledger, one reconciliation view.

Empower Your Business with EvPay Solutions

EVPAY provides innovative and reliable solutions tailored to help your business thrive in the modern digital landscape. From seamless integrations to intelligent automation, we ensure your operations are efficient, secure, and future-ready.

Get Started with EVPAY

What you get

Here is what you get when using our Card Payments Service.

Compliance

Encryption, tokenization, and operational controls built into the platform for security and regulatory compliance.

Integrated Rails

Run card payments alongside your existing mobile money and bank flows seamlessly in one system.

Local Hosting

Data residency and high performance through Habari Node ensures compliance and fast processing.

Analytics & Monitoring

Real-time dashboards and alerts let you track payments, detect issues, and optimize performance efficiently.
